# **Interactive Personal Profile & Contact Page**

A dynamic and accessible personal profile component featuring real-time data updates and a robust contact form with client-side validation. Built to showcase core frontend development skills, semantic HTML, and responsive design principles. ðŸš€

## Installation

To get a local copy up and running, follow these simple steps.

1.  **Clone the Repository:**
    ```bash
    git clone https://github.com/DeraTheOz/HNG-Stage-1.git
    ```
2.  **Navigate to the Project Directory:**
    ```bash
    cd HNG-Stage-1
    ```

## Usage

This project is a static web application. To view and interact with it:

- **Open `index.html`:** Simply open the `index.html` file directly in your preferred web browser.
  - The main profile card will display your details, social links, hobbies, and dislikes.
  - The current time in milliseconds will update dynamically.
- **Navigate:** Use the navigation links in the header to switch between the "Home", "About", and "Contact" pages.
- **Contact Form:** On the "Contact" page, fill out the form fields. The form includes client-side validation, providing instant feedback for invalid inputs. Upon successful submission, a success message will appear.

## Features

- **Dynamic Profile Card:** Displays personal information, a bio, social media links, hobbies, and dislikes, including a real-time updating timestamp.
- **Social Media Integration:** Direct links to Twitter, GitHub, and LinkedIn profiles for easy access.
- **"About Me" Page:** A dedicated section detailing the author's biography, program goals, areas for improvement, and a motivational note.
- **"Contact Me" Form:** A fully functional and accessible contact form designed for user inquiries.
- **Robust Form Validation:** Implements client-side validation for all input fields (Full Name, Email Address, Subject, Message) with clear error messages.
- **Success Message:** Provides visual feedback to the user upon successful form submission.
- **Semantic HTML & Accessibility:** Constructed with semantic HTML5 elements and `aria-` attributes to ensure high accessibility standards.
- **Responsive Design:** Styled to provide an optimal viewing experience across a wide range of devices and screen sizes.

## Technologies Used

| Technology                                                                                                                                                                 | Purpose                                     |
| :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------------ |
| [![HTML5](https://img.shields.io/badge/HTML5-E34F26?style=flat-square&logo=html5&logoColor=white)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML)                      | Structuring web content and semantics       |
| [![CSS3](https://img.shields.io/badge/CSS3-1572B6?style=flat-square&logo=css3&logoColor=white)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS)                          | Styling, layout, and responsive design      |
| [![JavaScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/JavaScript-F7DF1E?style=flat-square&logo=javascript&logoColor=black)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript) | Enhancing interactivity and form validation |
| [![Ionicons](https://img.shields.io/badge/Ionicons-3171E0?style=flat-square&logo=ionic&logoColor=white)](https://ionicons.com/)                                            | Providing vector icons for social links     |
| [![Google Fonts](https://img.shields.io/badge/Google%20Fonts-4285F4?style=flat-square&logo=google-fonts&logoColor=white)](https://fonts.google.com/)                       | Custom typography (Inter font)              |
